properties.headline: Winter Weather Advisory issued February 20 at 2:06AM AKST until February 21 at 12:00AM AKST by NWS Fairbanks, AK
properties.description:
* WHAT...Snow and blowing snow occurring. Visibility one half mile
or less at times. Less than 1 inch of additional snow
accumulation expected. Wind chills to 40 below. Travel will be
difficult.

* WHERE...Chukchi Sea Coast. The worst conditions will be north
of Cape Krusenstern.

* WHEN...Until midnight tonight.

* ADDITIONAL DETAILS...Winds gusting to 40 mph will cause low
visibility in blowing snow. Significant drifting snow will
occur. Cold wind chills to 40 below zero will cause frostbite in
as little as 10 minutes to exposed skin.

* ADDITIONAL DETAILS...Travel will be difficult.
properties.instruction:
A Winter Weather Advisory for blowing snow means periods of
blowing snow will cause travel difficulties.

NWSheadline: WINTER WEATHER ADVISORY IN EFFECT UNTIL MIDNIGHT AKST TONIGHT... ...BLIZZARD WARNING IS CANCELLED
